alert.note: Alert for Haralson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 3:24PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Tallapoosa River at US 78 near Tallapoosa affecting Haralson County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River at US 78 near Tallapoosa. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 78. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:21 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:21 PM EST Wednesday was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
